item.title: Don't put the socks in the fridge
item.description: In response to a set of recommendations I was presenting about an Enterprise Java solution architecture, a CTO once asked me: "Yeah, we've got this 2 GB EAR with 400+ WAR deployments inside. So what's the problem? The system still is completely functional!". My instant feeling was "Ok, this CTO himself is a much bigger problem than this EAR!"
item.dc:creator: Stefano Apostolico
